title: Meiryoutei Gotou Seijuurou
original_name: 明稜帝 梧桐勢十郎
sinopse:
Seijuurou is the reckless, violent student body president of Meiryou High School. He is so feared that his nickname is Meiryoutei: ''Emperor of Meiryou." What havoc will he wreak on his students (or force his student council to do) this time?

(Source: MU)
